reasoning: Acute leukemia includes acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) and acute myeloid leukemia (AML). Global incidence ~3.2 per 100k person-years (children ~0.8 per 100k, adults ~2.4 per 100k). Strong data from cancer registries including GLOBOCAN 2005, SEER, and population-based registries worldwide.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC); Surveillance, Epidemiology, and End Results Program (SEER)
